query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player_selections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  fantasy_team_id INT NOT NULL,
  player_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  player_role VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  points INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  is_captain BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  is_vice_captain BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (fantasy_team_id) REFERENCES fantasy_teams(id)
);
